# CalibrationSession { #DeToX.CalibrationSession }

```python
CalibrationSession(
    self,
    win,
    calibration_api,
    infant_stims,
    shuffle=True,
    audio=None,
    focus_time=0.5,
    anim_type='zoom',
    animation_settings=None,
    numkey_dict=None,
)
```

Infant-friendly calibration session manager.

Encapsulates the flow of a full calibration procedure:
  1. Validate input points
  2. Initialize stimuli
  3. Collect calibration data at chosen points
  4. Compute and display results
  5. Allow user to select points for re-calibration
  6. Discard data for retried points and loop back
  7. Save calibration if requested

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [check_points](#DeToX.CalibrationSession.check_points) | Ensure number of calibration points is within allowed range. |
| [run](#DeToX.CalibrationSession.run) | Execute the complete calibration loop. |

### check_points { #DeToX.CalibrationSession.check_points }

```python
CalibrationSession.check_points(calibration_points)
```

Ensure number of calibration points is within allowed range.

### run { #DeToX.CalibrationSession.run }

```python
CalibrationSession.run(calibration_points, save_calib=False)
```

Execute the complete calibration loop.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name               | Type                   | Description                                                     | Default    |
|--------------------|------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| calibration_points | list of (float, float) | PsychoPy-normalized (x, y) coordinates for calibration targets. | _required_ |
| save_calib         | bool                   | If True and calibration succeeds, save binary data to disk.     | `False`    |

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description                    |
|--------|--------|--------------------------------|
|        | bool   | True if calibration succeeded. |
